system.description: The character's unwavering faith in the Emperor shields them from the corrupting influence of Chaos and the horrors of the warp.
system.benefit: Immune to effects of Daemonic Presence, including negative Willpower Modifiers. Can spend a fate point to not take fear tests, not acquire insanity, and not gain corruption for the duration of an encounter. Can burn a fate point to resist any single daemonic or psychic attack and emerge unscathed.

specialAbilities.name: Daemonic Immunity
specialAbilities.description: You are immune to the effects of Daemonic Presence, including negative Willpower modifiers.

specialAbilities.name: Faith Point (Spend)
specialAbilities.description: You can spend a Fate Point to avoid taking Fear tests, acquiring Insanity, and gaining Corruption for the duration of an encounter.

specialAbilities.name: Faith Point (Burn)
specialAbilities.description: You can burn a Fate Point to completely resist any single daemonic or psychic attack and emerge unscathed.
